original: 3.3.5. Paccuppannānāgatavāra🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānāti so sotāyatanaṁ parijānissatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhu āyatanam parijānāti saḥ sota āyatanam parijānissati iti no
translated: … The section on the present and future🔽Does anyone who fully understands the eye-sphere also fully understand the ear-sphere? No.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānātīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānissati so cakkhu āyatanam parijānāti iti no
translated: Or does anyone who will fully understand the ear-sphere also fully understand the eye-sphere? No.

original: Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānāti so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissatīti?🔽Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānanti, no ca sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissanti.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhāyatanam na parijānāti saḥ sotāyatanam na parijānissati iti  ye maggam paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanam na parijānanti no ca sotāyatanam na parijānissanti
translated: Does anyone who does not fully understand the eye-sphere not fully understand the ear-sphere?🔽Those who will obtain the path do not fully understand the eye-sphere, but they do not not fully understand the ear-sphere.

original: Arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanañca na parijānanti
analyzed: arahā ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te cakkha āyatanam ca na parijānanti
translated: Arahats and ordinary people who will not obtain the path do not fully understand the eye-sphere
and they do not not fully understand the ear-sphere.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam na parijānissati so cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti iti
translated: Or does anyone who will not fully understand the ear-sphere not fully understand the eye-sphere?

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati, no ca cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānāti.
analyzed: aggamagga samaṅgī sota āyatanam na parijānissati no ca cakkhu āyatanam na parijānāti
translated: Those who possess the path to the first path will not fully understand the ear-sphere, but they do not not fully understand the eye-sphere.

original: Arahā ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti
analyzed: arahā ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanam ca na parijānissanti
translated: and ordinary people who will not obtain the path will not fully understand the ear faculty,
and they do not fully understand the eye faculty.
